org.icepdf.core.pobjects.graphics.RasterOps

Class GaussianFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.icepdf.core.pobjects.graphics.RasterOps.AbstractBufferedImageOp
      • org.icepdf.core.pobjects.graphics.RasterOps.ConvolveFilter
        • org.icepdf.core.pobjects.graphics.RasterOps.GaussianFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BufferedImageOp

    public class GaussianFilter
extends ConvolveFilter
    A filter which applies Gaussian blur to an image. This is a subclass of ConvolveFilter which simply creates a kernel with a Gaussian distribution for blurring.
    Author:
    Jerry Huxtable

    • Method Detail

      • setRadius

        public void setRadius(float radius)
        Set the radius of the kernel, and hence the amount of blur. The bigger the radius, the longer this filter will take.
        Parameters:
        radius - the radius of the blur in pixels.
